segments.source_content: This Week In React #111: Reassure, Multiplayer Cursors, Next.js, Meteor, Storybook, TanStack, FlashList, Bun...

translations.zh-hant: 本週 React 動態 #111：Reassure、多人游標協作、Next.js、Meteor、Storybook、TanStack、FlashList、Bun...

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_fc91ee08

segments.source_content: Hello everyone!

translations.zh-hant: 大家好！

segments.source_content: Another week with a lot of cool releases, like Reassure, FlashList or Bun 🤯

translations.zh-hant: 本週有許多精彩發布，像是 Reassure、FlashList 和 Bun 🤯

segments.source_content: Also 2 interactive articles👌

translations.zh-hant: 還有 2 篇互動式文章👌

segments.source_content: Towards the end of July, I'll switch to a bi-monthly rhythm. That's going to allow me to evolve the format of this newsletter a bit.

translations.zh-hant: 七月底開始，我將調整為雙週刊節奏，這能讓我有空間優化這份電子報的格式。

segments.source_content: I often forget to mention it here, but I keep an [Indie Hacker](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) page up to date: I report monthly on this newsletter with all my numbers: growth, sponsorship etc...

translations.zh-hant: 我常忘記在這裡提及，但我持續更新著 [Indie Hacker](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 頁面：每月記錄這份電子報的所有數據，包含成長量、贊助狀況等...

segments.source_content: 🙏 **Support the newsletter:**

translations.zh-hant: 🙏 **支持本電子報：**

translations.zh-hant:
- 😘 **推薦給朋友**：這確實很有幫助！
- 💸 [**贊助本週 React 動態**](https://gist.github.com/slorber/cb732fb5d0a002c4d73236a9baeba7bb?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 😍 [**在 Twitter 撰寫推薦語**](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/timelines/1448942785814466561?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

- 👥 追蹤 [**LinkedIn**](https://www.linkedin.com/company/this-week-in-react/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: ## React

translations.zh-hant: ## React 生態

segments.source_content: [**Reassure**](https://github.com/callstack/reassure?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Reassure**](https://github.com/callstack/reassure?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Reassure is a new React performance test library. Already presented previously, it has now been open-sourced by Callstack. It allows to post a report in a pull-request when perf regressions are detected. Example: a component that re-renders more slowly, or more often than before. For the moment only React-Native is supported, but web support will come very soon.

translations.zh-hant: Reassure 是新的 React 效能測試函式庫。由 Callstack 開源，能在偵測到效能衰退時於 Pull Request 自動提交報告，例如元件渲染變慢或渲染次數異常增加。目前僅支援 React-Native，但網頁版支援即將推出。

segments.source_content: [**How to animate multiplayer cursors**](https://liveblocks.io/blog/how-to-animate-multiplayer-cursors?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**如何實現多人游標動畫**](https://liveblocks.io/blog/how-to-animate-multiplayer-cursors?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: A great interactive article that proposes to animate the mouse cursor on several browsers in real time. This is a more complicated problem than it seems. Each approach is illustrated with a React implementation and presents different tradeoffs: CSS transitions, spring, splines...

translations.zh-hant: 精彩的互動式文章，探討跨瀏覽器即時多人游標動畫實作。問題比表面更複雜，每種解決方案都搭配 React 實例展示不同權衡：CSS 過渡、彈簧動畫、曲線擬合...

segments.source_content: [**How to Use Next.js Middleware**](https://www.ctnicholas.dev/articles/how-to-use-nextjs-middleware?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Next.js Middleware 實戰指南**](https://www.ctnicholas.dev/articles/how-to-use-nextjs-middleware?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Interactive article from the same author, presenting many middleware use cases. Already published here, it has just been updated following the official release of Next.js 12.2 which includes some breaking changes.

translations.zh-hant: 同作者的互動式文章，展示多種中介層應用場景。因應 Next.js 12.2 正式版破壞性變更，本文已同步更新。

segments.source_content: [**10 Years Of Meteor**](https://meteor10.sachagreif.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Meteor 十年回顧**](https://meteor10.sachagreif.com/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Sacha Grief (co-author of Discover Meteor, and also of the State of JS, CSS surveys...) takes a look back at 10 years of his personal history with the framework. Meteor has lost popularity, but remains used and has greatly influenced our frontend ecosystem.

translations.zh-hant: Sacha Grief（《Discover Meteor》合著者，同時也是 State of JS、CSS 調查的發起人...）回顧了他與這個框架長達十年的個人歷程。Meteor 雖已不再流行，但仍被使用中，並對我們的前端生態系統產生了深遠影響。

segments.source_content: [**The mystery of React Element, children, parents and re-renders**](https://www.developerway.com/posts/react-elements-children-parents?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**React 元素、子元件、父元件與重新渲染之謎**](https://www.developerway.com/posts/react-elements-children-parents?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Nadia highlights some React behaviors that can be surprising or even counter-intuitive, and explains in which case a parent's re-render will trigger a child's re-render on various edge-cases.

translations.zh-hant: Nadia 揭示了 React 中某些令人驚訝甚至違反直覺的行為，並解釋了在哪些邊緣情況下父元件的重新渲染會觸發子元件的重新渲染。

segments.source_content: [**Storybook Community Showcase #2**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Storybook 社群精選 #2**](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Summary of the latest news from the Storybook community: Component Encyclopedia, Figma plugin, Story Explorer, and various addons: Variants, CSS variables, Recoil...

translations.zh-hant: Storybook 社群最新動態摘要：元件百科全書、Figma 外掛、Story Explorer，以及各種擴充功能：變體、CSS 變數、Recoil...

segments.source_content: [**The new wave of React state management**](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-react-state-management/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**React 狀態管理的新浪潮**](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-react-state-management/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Presents the different problems that state management libs have to solve, and compares some of them. Pre/post Redux retrospective. Complete article but quite long: not easy to read.

translations.zh-hant: 探討狀態管理庫需解決的各種問題，並進行對比分析。包含 Redux 前後的發展回顧。內容完整但篇幅較長：閱讀門檻較高。

segments.source_content: **Extras:**

translations.zh-hant: **額外資源：**

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [Deploy Next.js 12.2 on Netlify today](https://www.netlify.com/blog/deploy-nextjs-12-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Next.js latest edge features can run on Netlify too
- 📜 [Use Next.js 12.2 On-Demand ISR to automatically refresh stale data](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/use-next-js-12-2-on-demand-isr-and-supabase-function-hooks-to-automatically-refresh-stale-data?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📖 [Thinking in Efffects](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1544090471655415810?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new doc page, work-in-progress
- 🐦 [Remix + Svelte](https://twitter.com/crim_codes/status/1542684471195045889?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [Astro Preact compat option](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1542511038230237185?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎥 [A Fresh new web framework is out](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=4boXExbbGCk)
- 📦 [FramerMotion 6.4](https://twitter.com/mattgperry/status/1544323698211045376?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new hook useInView()
- 📦 [TanStack Table v8](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1542925072502968320?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): new React-Table version is now framework-agnostic and also supports Svelte, Solid, Vue
- 📦 [storybook-addon-docusaurus](https://storybook.js.org/addons/storybook-addon-docusaurus?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [立即在 Netlify 部署 Next.js 12.2](https://www.netlify.com/blog/deploy-nextjs-12-2/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：Next.js 最新邊緣功能同樣可在 Netlify 運行
- 📜 [使用 Next.js 12.2 按需 ISR 自動刷新過時資料](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/use-next-js-12-2-on-demand-isr-and-supabase-function-hooks-to-automatically-refresh-stale-data?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📖 [Effect 的思維模式](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1544090471655415810?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：新文件頁面，開發中版本
- 🐦 [Remix + Svelte](https://twitter.com/crim_codes/status/1542684471195045889?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [Astro Preact 相容選項](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1542511038230237185?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎥 [全新網頁框架 Fresh 問世](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=4boXExbbGCk)
- 📦 [FramerMotion 6.4](https://twitter.com/mattgperry/status/1544323698211045376?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：新增 useInView() 鉤子
- 📦 [TanStack Table v8](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1542925072502968320?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：新版 React-Table 實現框架無關性，同時支援 Svelte、Solid、Vue
- 📦 [storybook-addon-docusaurus](https://storybook.js.org/addons/storybook-addon-docusaurus?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: ## 💸 Sponsors

translations.zh-hant: ## 💸 贊助商

segments.source_content: 💡 [How to sponsor this newsletter](https://gist.github.com/slorber/cb732fb5d0a002c4d73236a9baeba7bb?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: 💡 [如何贊助本電子報](https://gist.github.com/slorber/cb732fb5d0a002c4d73236a9baeba7bb?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: [**TechTree - Introducing This Week in React Bounty Board**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**TechTree - 介紹《本週 React》賞金看板**](https://techtree.dev/t/sHBrozirH3xSY8jP3M7gGv?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: TechTree is building the first **social-economic platform for developers** - a place to help you unlock the real value of your knowledge and network!

translations.zh-hant: TechTree 正在打造首個**開發者社經平台**——協助您釋放知識與人脈的真正價值！

segments.source_content: The first major feature on TechTree is Bounties, a tool to help you **earn money by referring your friends** to open roles at top VC backed tech startups or find a job that might be right for you!

translations.zh-hant: TechTree 的首項主要功能是「賞金任務」，此工具能協助您**透過推薦朋友**申請頂尖創投科技新創的職缺，或尋找適合的工作機會！

segments.source_content: To help show you around, I have gone ahead and created my very own Bounty board - **a selection of remote, React related roles for you to apply to or refer your network to**. There has been over $300k worth of Bounties claimed on TechTree so far!

translations.zh-hant: 為幫助您了解，我已創建專屬的賞金看板——精選遠端 React 相關職缺供您申請或推薦人脈參與！迄今 TechTree 已累積超過 30 萬美元的賞金發放紀錄。

segments.source_content: Looking to hire React developers? You can post Bounties of your own to be featured on my Bounty board! Read more and get started [here](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).

translations.zh-hant: 正在招聘 React 開發者嗎？您可發布專屬賞金任務並展示於我的賞金看板！[點此](https://www.notion.so/techtreedev/Share-your-jobs-on-my-Bounty-board-c51d2d97d9f3421bab103c42097907ae?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)了解更多詳情。

segments.source_content: [Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

translations.zh-hant: [Storetasker：Shopify 自由開發者網絡](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

segments.source_content: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).

translations.zh-hant: 您好！我是 Storetasker 的 Tim。我們運營頂尖的 Shopify 開發自由工作者網絡。若您熱衷於建構 Shopify 網站，或期待運用 Shopify 的**尖端 React 框架**打造客製化店面：[**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)，誠摯邀請您加入。

segments.source_content: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).

translations.zh-hant: 獲准入選的開發者將以自由工作者身份接案，我們將提供與頂尖 Shopify 品牌合作的絕佳機會（包括 Alo Yoga、Chubbies、JUDY 等眾多品牌）。

segments.source_content: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.

translations.zh-hant: Storetasker 的優勢在於開發者間無需競爭——只需挑選符合興趣的任務。更重要的是，這裡凝聚了緊密的社群氛圍。

segments.source_content: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.

translations.zh-hant: 歡迎透過此[連結](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)直接申請加入。

segments.source_content: ## React-Native

translations.zh-hant: ## React-Native

segments.source_content: [**FlashList - Fast & Performant React Native List**](https://shopify.github.io/flash-list/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**FlashList - 高效能 React Native 列表元件**](https://shopify.github.io/flash-list/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Shopify has just released FlashList, its alternative to FlatList to solve performance issues when scrolling and avoid showing empty cells. The goal is to keep 60fps even on low-end Android devices, without complicating the implementation. The library reuses already rendered cells: you'll have to adapt your use of React `key` to let it take over.

translations.zh-hant: Shopify 近期發布 FlashList，作為 FlatList 的替代方案，解決滾動效能問題並避免顯示空白單元格。目標是在低階 Android 設備上維持 60fps 流暢度，同時保持實作簡潔。此函式庫會複用已渲染單元格：您需調整 React `key` 的使用方式以充分發揮其效能。

segments.source_content: [**React-Native-Compat-Table**](https://retyui.github.io/react-native-compat-table/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**React-Native-Compat-Table**](https://retyui.github.io/react-native-compat-table/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Lists the API support of each React-Native runtime (JSC, V8, Android...) in a comprehensive way. The author also explains [why React Native recommends TS config lib: "es2017"](https://dev.to/retyui/why-react-native-typescript-config-recommends-to-use-a-five-years-old-standard-lib-es2017-3bjk?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: 以全面方式列出每個 React-Native 運行環境（JSC、V8、Android...）的 API 支援情況。作者同時解釋了[為什麼 React Native 推薦 TS 設定庫使用 "es2017"](https://dev.to/retyui/why-react-native-typescript-config-recommends-to-use-a-five-years-old-standard-lib-es2017-3bjk?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: **Extras:**

translations.zh-hant: **其他資訊：**

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [What's New in React Native 0.69 --- How to Upgrade and Why it Matters](https://blog.devgenius.io/whats-new-in-react-native-0-69-how-to-upgrade-and-why-it-matters-59f0841c08fc?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧵 [Expo 46 + web](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1542431795903451136?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Evan Bacon gives details about changes in web support and also confirms the ambition to replace Webpack by Metro.
- 🧵 [React-Native vs mobile native trends](https://twitter.com/GergelyOrosz/status/1542020036587667457?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): the development of native apps seems to decrease.
- 🐦 [FlatList vs FlashList perf comparison](https://twitter.com/almouro/status/1542848782693449728?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [React-Native vs Flutter diagram](https://twitter.com/t3dotgg/status/1544168855412428801?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [Webpack Module Federation + React Native](https://twitter.com/ScriptedAlchemy/status/1542311673964273664?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎙️ [RNR 241 - Redux Toolkit vs MobX-State-Tree Showdown](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-241-redux-toolkit-vs-mobx-state-tree-showdown?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎥 [The React Native Avengers: GestureHandler, Reanimated, and Skia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=yBuhnVDXekQ)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [React Native 0.69 新功能——升級方法與重要性解析](https://blog.devgenius.io/whats-new-in-react-native-0-69-how-to-upgrade-and-why-it-matters-59f0841c08fc?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧵 [Expo 46 + web](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1542431795903451136?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Evan Bacon 詳述 web 支援變更，並確認將用 Metro 取代 Webpack 的目標

- 🐦 [FlatList 與 FlashList 效能比較](https://twitter.com/almouro/status/1542848782693449728?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [React-Native 與 Flutter 架構圖解](https://twitter.com/t3dotgg/status/1544168855412428801?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [Webpack Module Federation + React Native](https://twitter.com/ScriptedAlchemy/status/1542311673964273664?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎙️ [RNR 241 - Redux Toolkit 與 MobX-State-Tree 對決實錄](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-241-redux-toolkit-vs-mobx-state-tree-showdown?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: ## Other

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他

segments.source_content: [**Bun - an incredibly fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime.**](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Bun - 極速全功能 JavaScript 運行環境**](https://bun.sh/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: A new JavaScript runtime that competes directly with Node.js and Deno on performance, based on JSC (not v8) and written in Zig. A complete toolchain with a bundler, transpiler, package manager and even test runner. We already talked about the Bun bundler last year but the scope has expanded to something larger, and v0.1 has just been released.

translations.zh-hant: 基於 JSC（非 v8）並以 Zig 語言開發的全新 JavaScript 運行環境，在效能上直接與 Node.js 和 Deno 競爭。提供完整工具鏈含打包工具、轉譯器、套件管理器及測試執行器。去年我們已討論過 Bun 打包工具，現其範疇已擴展至更廣領域，且 v0.1 版本剛發布。

segments.source_content: **Extras:**

translations.zh-hant: **其他資訊：**
